name: Golfing Greats
overview:
Stroke-play or match-play golfing game in a 3-D environment.

1-4 players can play either stroke play or match play golf. Each player chooses one of four set character with different strengths and weaknesses (e.g. power hitter, experience etc.) In match play there are three extra events throughout 18 holes (Longest Drive, Nearest Hole, another Longest Drive) where an extra ball (life) is awarded to the winning player. '3-D' graphics with lots of panning and zooming.
